text: The 2025 Indian Premier League (also known as Tata IPL 2025 for sponsorship reasons and sometimes referred to as IPL 2025 or IPL 18) was the 18th season of the Indian Premier League, a franchise Twenty20 cricket league in India. It is organised by the Board of Control for Cricket in India. Kolkata Knight Riders are the defending champions. They won their third title in the previous season. ==References== Category:Indian Premier League
title: 2025 Indian Premier League
